title: [神范墨水制造]1.8原版mod，神奇的箭~（原创）（命令方块）
author: 神范墨水0.0
txt_content:
本帖最后由 神范墨水0.0 于 2015-6-6 17:30 编辑 
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1c0q9Amc
你们知道我是谁吗？我就是那 BI~ 的神范墨水呀！
今天我给大家带来一个原创原版mod（将命令输入到命令方块里，用红石块驱动）：
神奇的箭！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
神奇的箭主要有4个：闪电箭、炸弹箭、怪物箭、疯狂之箭
首先是闪电箭：
你只需射出一个箭，就有如此x的效果：


问题在于他不会停，要一直等到箭消失（捡起来或自然消失）才停下来（也可以把命令方块关闭）
多射几个！


哦呵呵呵呵呵，根本停不下来！（这个不是很卡，还算顺畅）
命令:
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-15 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-11 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-10 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-9 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-8 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-7 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-6 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-5 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-4 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-3 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{}]}\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 8"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 bedrock 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:\"{text:\\\"作者：神范墨水\\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\\"}}\",Text2:\"{text:\\\"品名：闪电箭\\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:gold,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\\"}}\",Text3:\"{text:\\\"点击此牌关闭系统\\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\\"}}\",Text4:\"{text:\\\"\\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 air\\\"}}\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~19 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}


请在命令方块里运行，输入框里打不下……




接下来是炸弹箭！熊孩子的最爱！
先射一个试试……


他有着闪电箭的性质，你必须要等或者关掉命令方块才会停止……
QAQ：不能捡吗？
你想捡都捡不到，你只要一靠近，他就会把你炸开（生存模式直接DIED）。
照例，多射几个……


才射了3个，LZ的电脑就卡X了，卡服必备！
命令:
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-15 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-11 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-10 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-9 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-8 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-7 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-6 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-5 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-4 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-3 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTnt ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{}]}\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 8"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 bedrock 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:\"{text:\\\"作者：神范墨水\\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~0 ~8 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}


和闪电箭一样，要在命令方块里输入……



好的，我们继续……
怪物箭！
我只敢射一个，恐怕射两个就卡崩了……
试一下先……


5秒钟，射了一个箭，好痛苦！先开和平模式刷一下……
照样，他会不停地刷怪物，直到箭消失或命令方块关闭……
我X都不会射第2下的！
命令:
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-15 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-11 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-10 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-9 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/没用\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-8 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon Spider ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{}]}\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-7 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon Blaze ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{}]}\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-6 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon summon Creeper ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{}]}\"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-4 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/execute ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}


最后，王牌来了！
疯狂之箭！
LZ刚才射了一箭，存档就没用了……
你只要射一箭就会同时冒出999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999……个箭（你的Minecraft坚持不了1分钟，我发誓！）
命令：
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-15 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-11 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}


如果4个模组一起打开，我们射一个箭会怎样呢？
……
……
……
……
……
正在注销……


我XXXXXXXXXXXXX！


最后，我推荐大家，向你最讨厌的服务器要个OP，然后把4个模组全开，射一个箭……木哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！


最后，我推荐OP，不要随便给人OP，否则，后果自负……



最后：1.如果你复制不了，可以点击上面的下载地址下载一下文本，里面很全！
2.伸手党快来啊，我欢迎你.



您的查看，就是对我最大的支持！

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
我是小懒鱼 发表于 2015-6-6 11:56
什么鬼
举报不谢，连茶馆都不给怎么水

replies.author: 熊猫k
replies.txt_content: LZ可以用execute呀，execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~复制代码，再加一个高频。

replies.author: 1XWJ
replies.txt_content:
熊猫k 发表于 2015-6-28 12:07
LZ可以用execute呀，，再加一个高频。
小白射一只箭就不好了= =

replies.author: 1XWJ
replies.txt_content: 四个都开起来？小白要起义了！！！

replies.author: MoKuai_Modular
replies.txt_content: 这么多的命令 不可以复制 你想让我们一个一个打吗{:10_507:}
